objects.text:
• Digital LED Display
• Multiple Wash Cycles
• Energy-Efficient
• Anti-Vibration System

product_details.name: Insignia Smart Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Excellence
product_details.description:
• Digital LED Display with Intuitive Control Panel
• Multiple Wash Cycles Including Express, Delay, and Temperature Control
• Large Capacity Front-Loading Design for Efficient Cleaning
• Energy-Efficient Operation with Smart Programming
• Sleek White Modern Design with Chrome Accents
• Easy-to-Use Dial Selector for Cycle Customization
• Clear View Door with Safety Lock System
• Advanced Water Management System
• Anti-Vibration Support Feet for Stable Operation
• Digital Time Remaining Display
• Multiple Temperature Settings for Various Fabric Types
• Compact Yet Spacious Design Perfect for Modern Homes

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, tech-oriented layout promoting a front-load washer. The background is composed of layered geometric elements including diagonal shapes, circles, and lines in varied opacities for depth. The hero product image, placed prominently on the right, showcases the washing machine. On the left, there are several text layers: the bold futuristic heading (`heading`) at the top, followed by a supporting subheading (`subheading`). Mid-section highlights include a feature list (`features`) and an engaging tagline (`tagline`). At the bottom-left, a large price text (`price`) captures attention, supported by a call-to-action button (`cta` with `cta_button` background).

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0A2472
- Sky Blue: #A9D3FF
- Royal Blue: #3D7AF0
- Light Gray: #EAEDF5
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a modern washing machine with a minimalist, sleek aesthetic. The primary color is **white** (#FFFFFF), creating a clean and contemporary feel. **Glossy black** (#1A1A1A) is used for the door and control panel, framing the product and adding contrast that draws attention to its functional elements. **Steel silver** (#C0C0C0) appears in the dial, offering a high-tech appeal. Accents of **electric blue** (#00BFFF) in the digital screen and dial markings enhance visibility and communicate smart technology. These colors blend harmoniously, while sharp outlines and glossy surfaces highlight key features. Ideal for a clean, futuristic ad banner.
